name: AVSampleCursorAudioDependencyInfo
desc: A structure that describes the independent decodability of audio samples.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates an audio sample decodability information structure.

items.name: init(audioSampleIsIndependentlyDecodable: ObjCBool, audioSamplePacketRefreshCount: Int)
items.desc: Creates an audio sample decodability information structure with the specified values.

items.name: var audioSampleIsIndependentlyDecodable: ObjCBool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the sample is independently decodable.

items.name: var audioSamplePacketRefreshCount: Int
items.desc: The number of samples, starting at the current sample, that must be fed to the decoder to achieve full decoder refresh.
